titleStmt.title: Toleration not to be abused by the Independents by a lover of truth and peace.
titleStmt.author: Fullwood, Francis, d. 1693.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for John Martyn and are to be sold by Abisha Brocas bookseller in Exeter,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the Union Theological Seminary Library, New York.
